content: in first chain space of increase shell ch1 shell in second chain space of inch shell continue on in this manner alternating shells and increase shells at the ends of the row and working the center spine by repeating increase shell then 2 shells worked in the chain sps then 3 shells worked in the chain sps apart from row 2 this third row in the center spine increase is the only time in the shawl that you will work a shell into the chain space between two other shells weave in ends and block if desired have a handful of crudely-drawn charts i wasn t sure how blockable the yarn was that i made the shawl from but i wanted to see how this would block so i did a swatch with some leftover merino/silk i had
